title: Electron microscopic observations on structures resembling myxovirus in human sarcomas.
abstract: Human tumors of mesenchymal origin contain cytoplasmic structures resembling ribonucleoprotein strands of paramyxoviruses. Similar structures have previously been reported in collagen diseases. The nature and function of these structures remain unresolved.
authors: F Györkey; J G Sinkovics; P Györkey
